did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals Publications, 1974-1976

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications of the Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes copies of 1974, 1975, and 1976 convention programs, copy of a paper submitted by Wilson Hart for the 1974 convention, copies of papers submitted at the 1975 convention other than those printed in Public Personnel Management. These include remarks by Fibish, Freehling, Chaskelson, Tobias, Reuben and Black.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals (U.S.)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals Publications #5532. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Society of Labor Relations Professionals' Convention Programs

scopecontent.p: February 7-8, 1974. 2 copies.

did.unittitle: Item 1: Convention '74; The Evolving Federal Labor Relations Program

scopecontent.p: By Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals (SFLRP). February 7-8, 1974. 2 copies. Item is in English.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Convention '75: Problems and Prospects for Federal Labor Relations

scopecontent.p: By Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals (SFLRP). February 27-28, 1975. 2 copies. Item is in English.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Convention '76: Federal Labor-Management Relations: Current Problems and Future Solutions

scopecontent.p: By Society of Federal Labor Relations Professionals (SFLRP). Febraury 19-20, 1976. 3 copies. Item is in English.

did.unittitle: The Labor Relations Professional in the Federal Sector
Item 1: The Labor Relations Professional in the Federal Sector: Role, Expectations, Problems

scopecontent.p: By Wilson R. Hart. Remarks prepared for presentation at the SFLRP convention, Feburary 8, 1974. Item is in English.
